about.mainDescription: I am a full-stack web developer. I have been working on web technologies for 3 years. Every new thing in this world excites me to explore. I read a lot of blogs about tech and software. I love traveling. I mentor people in my free time. I train students who come out of college to get their first job.
about.title: Full Stack Web Developer
about.subDescription1: In the initial days of my career, I have worked as an Electronics Engineer and then moved to a different career path. Now I am working as a Senior Software Engineer at In Time Tec.
about.subDescription2: I am open to learn from people and society. I like to stay in the present and value what I have. I play all kinds of games and sports. I play volleyball and cricket more often. I like watching sports as well. My three favorite players are Cristiano Ronaldo (Football), Novak Djokovic (Tennis), and MS Dhoni (Cricket).

skill.description: In the last three years, I acquired a wide range of skills while working with different clients and projects. Also, I have been working on some fun projects in my free time to explore new technologies and standards.

contact.description: I am available to work, collaborate, mentor, and train in my free time. Please reach out.

resume.description: Innovative and deadline-driven Web Developer with 3 years of experience designing and developing user-centered digital/print marketing material from initial concept to final, polished deliverable.

education.title: PRIMARY & SECONDAY SCHOOL EDUCATION

education.title: MATHS, PHYSICS & CHEMISTRY (INTERMEDIATE)
points: I pursued my plus two in MPC and completed with a first-class mark of 87%

education.title: BACHELOR OF TECHNOLOGY & SCIENCE

points: I pursued my bachelor's degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering and completed it with a first-class mark of 80%
